package.description: ground_station is a package for ROS Fuerte/Ubuntu 12.04 which typicaly subscribes to several topics and update a Gtk+ based GUI. It was originally made for the CityFlyer research project of the CCNY Robotics lab.
package.author: Modified by Murilo Fernandes Martins; Created by Gautier Dumonteil

review.notes: This is unstable and under active development.
